value.title: Mojo Vision Will Power Its Smart Contact Lens With An External Compute Pack
value.excerpt: The Mojo smart contact lens, due to ship within the next few years, boasts 14,000 pixels per inch packed into a sand-grain-sized display that beams directly into your eyes’ fovea, the tiny part in the center of your eye with the greatest concentration of retinal cones: your natural photoreceptors.
